tls-sled.desc-tool: Itâ€™s a script inspired by its older brother SSLScan used to evalue the security level of a web site with its IP and port in the parameters. It use the libuary OpennSSL. IT test if the web site accept connexions with old protocol like SSLv2 or old ciphers suits like RC4 or MD5 for example.

aide.cible: Precise the IP address (192.168.0.1) or target hostname (target.com)
aide.port: Indicate port to target (between 0 and 65535). Default port is 443
